---
title: "PIB"
author: "ThreeME team"
format: 
  html:
    self-contained: false 
params:
  project_name: "frelance"
  colour: "blue"
  scenario: !expr c("baseline","ct1")  # List of scenarii to be plotted
---


```{r}
library(tidyverse)

project_name <- params$project_name
scenarios <- c(params$scenario) |> unique()
couleur_ligne <- params$colour

data_full <- readRDS(file.path("data","output",paste0(project_name,".rds")))
```


```{r}

plot_PIB <- data_full |> filter(variable == "GDP", scenario %in% scenarios) |> 
  ggplot(aes(x = year, y = values)) +
  geom_line(aes(linetype = scenario), colour = couleur_ligne)

plot_PIB
```
